root: ^Everything I did, I did for you.
^All the things I wanted to do, I could do because you let me.
^I barely had a choice because everything hinges on your family not finding out.
^I feel like a dirty secret, Nick.
^I was closeted too, and I hated myself for a long time because of it.
^And having to pretend that we aren't a thing put me back in that dark place.
^It sucks, but we've pretended so long that we're probably gonna put up the same front for the rest of our years in this goddamn town.
^It made me fucking miserable, and it still does. But I sucked it up because I didn't want to ruin your life.
^So don't tell me that this isn't about me because it was always about you!
